Body: My screen is smashed and the screen does not work at all on my Samsung Galaxy phone, so I was wondering how reset the phone (delete all the pictures mainly) by not using the way where you have to press the home button and lock button etc and then it comes up with a list on the screen. I am really hoping there is some kind of way where you can take off the back of the phone and there is some way to delete everything off the phone with cutting a wire or something like that?
Title: Screen smashed and need to delete/wipe/reset everything

history.Text: My screen is smashed and the screen does not work at all on my samsung galaxy phone, so i was wondering how reset the phone (delete all the pictures mainly) buy not using the way where you have to press the home button and lock button etc and then it comes up with a list on the screen. I am really hoping there is some kind of way where you can take off the back of the phone and there is some way to delete everything off the phone with cutting a wire or something like that????? PLEASE REPLY ASAP
